definition[0]: to make something work much better or become much better again
example[0]: plans to rejuvenate the inner city areas
definition[1]: to make someone look or feel young and strong again
example[1]: I came back from holiday feeling rejuvenated.
explanation[0]: Rejuvenate is usually passive in this meaning
definition[2]: to make a company, product, market etc successful again, for example by changing it or by introducing something new
example[2]: He has shown an ability to rejuvenate ailing companies.
example[3]: Even lower rates wonâ€™t be enough torejuvenate the economy.
